title: Hide Yo Kids, Hide Yo Likes
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
On this week's episode of #TheFriendZone, it's a social media roundup. We discuss Pornhub buying Tumblr? Instagram hiding likes to preserve our mental health. And the 3 new features Facebook is adding that should make things a little spicy this summer.

Wellness Segment - Fran's favorite Reebok High Rise Workout Leggings. 40% off with code FRIEND at checkout https://www.reebok.com/us/lux-high-rise-legging/BR5244.html

Black Business of the Week - Cycling Class in Queens, NY https://www.instagram.com/_rydindirty

Thank you to our Sponsors:

Dead Ass Podcast - Khadeen and Devale Ellis from YouTube have a new podcast out now called Dead Ass, which is full of unfiltered, raw and honest conversations about raising a millennial family. Available on all podcast apps.

The Sun Is Also A Star - Fall in love with this modern love story, starring Yara Shahidi and Charles Melton. Only in theater May 17th.

Lively Bras - Where high style meets ultimate comfort. Available in 32A-44DDD. For a limited time, get $10 off of your first order by visiting https://www.wearlively.com/FRIENDZONE promo code FRIENDZONE.

Talkspace - Therapy for how we live today. To match with your perfect therapist for a fraction of the price of traditional therapy, go to https://www.talkspace.com/ and use code ZONE at checkout to get your first week free.

Daily Harvest - Carefully sourced, chef crafted smoothies, savory bowls, overnight oats, and more, built on fruits and vegetables. Go to https://www.daily-harvest.com and enter promo code FRIENDZONE to get 3 cups FREE in your first box.

MAC Cosmetics - MAC Powder Kiss Lipstick is matte reinvented. Head to your nearest MAC location to meet your matte today, or shop at https://www.maccosmetics.com

Find us online: 
https://twitter.com/FriendZonePod
https://www.facebook.com/TheFriendZonePodcast

Have a dope day!
